body.p: Blandville, Kentucky, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Sarah Jane Evans. Father of Evaline Evans, Elonzo Evans, Elizabeth A. Evans, Mary F. Evans, Sarah B. Evans, Harriett Evans, and George Evans. Cooper in Ballard County in 1850. Farmer in Blandville in 1860.
